Documents by KapitalWise

Getting Started Edit

Welcome to KapitalWise Smart Investing and Saving API.

This API document is designed for those interested in developing for KapitalWise platform.

This API is still under development and will evolve.

You’ll succeed if you do this.

Here’s some useful information.

Something may not happen if you try and do this.

Something bad will happen if you do this.

Authentication Edit

You need to be authenticated for all API requests. You can request an API key by contacting us here.

Add the API key to all requests as a GET parameter.

Nothing will work unless you include this API key

 $.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/users/", { "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"}, function(data) {
   alert(data);
 });

 curl http://api.kapitalwise.com/books?token=YOUR_APP_KEY

Errors Edit

Code Name Description
200 OK Success
201 Created Creation Successful
400 Bad Request We could not process that action
403 Forbidden We couldn’t authenticate you

All errors will return JSON in the following format:

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "error message here"
}

/users Edit

List all users

Parameters
offset
Offset the results by this amount
limit
Limit the number of users returned

This call will return a maximum of 100 users

Lists all the photos you have access to. You can paginate by using the parameters listed above.

$.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/users/", { "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

r = requests.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/users/", token="YOUR_APP_KEY")
print r.text

var request = require("request");
request("http://api.kapitalwise.com/users?token=YOUR_APP_KEY", function (error, response, body) {
if (!error && response.statusCode == 200) {
  console.log(body);
}

curl http://sampleapi.readme.com/orders?key=YOUR_APP_KEY

[
  { 
  "id": 1,
  "dateOfBirth": "05/28/1988",
  "state": "NY",
  "lastName": "John",
  "firstName": "Doe",
  "address1": "43",
  "zip": "10010",
  "address2": "W 23rd Street",
  "usResident": "true",
  "city": "New York",
  "brokerDealerAff": "false",
  "boardMember": "false",
  "email": "john.doe@gmail.com",
  "subBackupWithld": "false",
  "phone":"+19143184030"
  },
  {

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid offset"
}

/users Edit

Create User

Parameters
dateOfBirth
The title for the book
state
The book's score between 0 and 5
lastName
The title for the book
firstName
The book's score between 0 and 5
address1
The title for the book
address2
The title for the book
city
The title for the book
zip
The book's score between 0 and 5
email
The book's score between 0 and 5
phone
The book's score between 0 and 5
ssn
The book's score between 0 and 5
passcode
The book's score between 0 and 5
password
The book's score between 0 and 5
subBackupWithld
The book's score between 0 and 5
usResident
The book's score between 0 and 5
brokerDealerAff
The title for the book
boardMember
The book's score between 0 and 5

The book will automatically be added to your reading list

Adds a book to your collection.

$.post("http://api.kapitalwise.com/books/", {
  "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
  "title": "The Book Thief",
  "score": 4.3
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{ 
  "dateOfBirth": "05/28/1988",
  "state": "NY",
  "lastName": "John",
  "firstName": "Doe",
  "address1": "43",
  "zip": "10010",
  "address2": "W 23rd Street",
  "usResident": "true",
  "city": "New York",
  "brokerDealerAff": "false",
  "boardMember": "false",
  "email": "john.doe@gmail.com",
  "subBackupWithld": "false",
  "phone":"+19143184030",
  "ssn": "152225201",
  "passcode": "3100",
  "password": "kap1talw1se"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "User with this email already exists"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Known error"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid password"
}
{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid passcode"
}

/users/:id Edit

Get User

Returns a specific user from the system

$.get("http://api.kapitalwise.com/users/3", {
  token: "YOUR_APP_KEY",
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{ 
  "id": 3,
  "dateOfBirth": "05/28/1988",
  "state": "NY",
  "lastName": "John",
  "firstName": "Doe",
  "address1": "43",
  "zip": "10010",
  "address2": "W 23rd Street",
  "usResident": "true",
  "city": "New York",
  "brokerDealerAff": "false",
  "boardMember": "false",
  "email": "john.doe@gmail.com",
  "subBackupWithld": "false",
  "phone":"+19143184030"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "User doesn't exist"
}

/users/:id Edit

Update User

Parameters
dateOfBirth
The title for the book
state
The book's score between 0 and 5
lastName
The title for the book
firstName
The book's score between 0 and 5
address1
The title for the book
address2
The title for the book
city
The title for the book
zip
The book's score between 0 and 5
email
The book's score between 0 and 5
phone
The book's score between 0 and 5
ssn
The book's score between 0 and 5
passcode
The book's score between 0 and 5
password
The book's score between 0 and 5
subBackupWithld
The book's score between 0 and 5
usResident
The book's score between 0 and 5
brokerDealerAff
The title for the book
boardMember
The book's score between 0 and 5

Update an existing user in the system.

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.kapitalwise.com/users/3",
  "type": "PUT",
  "data": {
  "dateOfBirth": "05/28/1988",
  "state": "NY",
  "lastName": "John",
  "firstName": "Doe",
  "address1": "43",
  "zip": "10010",
  "address2": "W 23rd Street",
  "usResident": "true",
  "city": "New York",
  "brokerDealerAff": "false",
  "boardMember": "false",
  "email": "john.doe@gmail.com",
  "subBackupWithld": "false",
  "phone":"+19143184030"
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
}
});

{ 
  "id": 3,
  "dateOfBirth": "05/28/1988",
  "state": "NY",
  "lastName": "John",
  "firstName": "Doe",
  "address1": "43",
  "zip": "10010",
  "address2": "W 23rd Street",
  "usResident": "true",
  "city": "New York",
  "brokerDealerAff": "false",
  "boardMember": "false",
  "email": "john.doe@gmail.com",
  "subBackupWithld": "false",
  "phone":"+19143184030"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "User doesn't exist"
}

/users/:id Edit

Deletes a user

Deletes a user in the system.

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.kapitalwise.com/users/3",
  "type": "DELETE",
  "data": {
    "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
  }
});

{
  "id": 3,
  "status": "deleted"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "User doesn't exist"
}

/accounts Edit

List all books

Parameters
offset
Offset the results by this amount
limit
Limit the number of books returned

This call will return a maximum of 100 books

Lists all the photos you have access to. You can paginate by using the parameters listed above.

$.get("http://api.myapp.com/books/", { "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

r = requests.get("http://api.myapp.com/books/", token="YOUR_APP_KEY")
print r.text

var request = require("request");
request("http://api.myapp.com/books?token=YOUR_APP_KEY", function (error, response, body) {
if (!error && response.statusCode == 200) {
  console.log(body);
}

curl http://sampleapi.readme.com/orders?key=YOUR_APP_KEY

[
  {
    "id": 1,
    "title": "The Hunger Games",
    "score": 4.5,
    "dateAdded": "12/12/2013"
  },
  {
    "id": 1,
    "title": "The Hunger Games",
    "score": 4.7,
    "dateAdded": "15/12/2013"
  },
]

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid offset"
}

/accounts Edit

Create User

Parameters
title
The title for the book
score
The book's score between 0 and 5

The book will automatically be added to your reading list

Adds a book to your collection.

$.post("http://api.myapp.com/books/", {
  "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
  "title": "The Book Thief",
  "score": 4.3
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{
  "id": 3,
  "title": "The Book Thief",
  "score": 4.3,
  "dateAdded": "5/1/2015"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Invalid score"
}

/accounts/:id Edit

Get User

Returns a specific book from your collection

$.get("http://api.myapp.com/books/3", {
  token: "YOUR_APP_KEY",
}, function(data) {
  alert(data);
});

{
  "id": 3,
  "title": "The Book Thief",
  "score": 4.3,
  "dateAdded": "5/1/2015"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Book doesn't exist"
}

/accounts/:id Edit

Update Book

Parameters
title
The title for the book
score
The book's score between 0 and 5

Update an existing book in your collection.

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.myapp.com/books/3",
  "type": "PUT",
  "data": {
    "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
    "score": 5.0,
    "title": "The Book Stealer"
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
  }
});

{
  "id": 3,
  "title": "The Book Stealer",
  "score": 5,
  "dateAdded": "5/1/2015"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Book doesn't exist"
}

/accounts/:id Edit

Deletes a user

Deletes a book in your collection.

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.myapp.com/books/3",
  "type": "DELETE",
  "data": {
    "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY"
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
  }
});

{
  "id": 3,
  "status": "deleted"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Book doesn't exist"
}

/investment_history/:id Edit

Update Book

Parameters
title
The title for the book
score
The book's score between 0 and 5

Update an existing book in your collection.

$.ajax({
  "url": "http://api.myapp.com/books/3",
  "type": "PUT",
  "data": {
    "token": "YOUR_APP_KEY",
    "score": 5.0,
    "title": "The Book Stealer"
  },
  "success": function(data) {
    alert(data);
  }
});

{
  "id": 3,
  "title": "The Book Stealer",
  "score": 5,
  "dateAdded": "5/1/2015"
}

{
  "error": true,
  "message": "Book doesn't exist"
